explains: n. 护发素；衣物柔顺剂；调节剂，调节器
wordGroup: air conditioner n. 空调设备；空气调节机
soil conditioner 土壤调理剂；土壤改良剂
room air conditioner 房间空气调节器

sentences.en: Regular use of conditioner is supposed to give your hair more body.
sentences.cn: 经常使用护发素能使头发更浓密。

sentences.en: This hair conditioner is excellent for revitalizing dry, lifeless hair.
sentences.cn: 这种护发素对使干枯、无生气的头发重新焕发光彩非常有效。
